name: Welcome to Hygo Limited
description: Hygo are suppliers of Washroom, Hygiene,
overview:
Hygo are suppliers of Washroom, Hygiene, Cleaning & Janitorial products. We primarily aim to provide extensive range of environment friendly quality products and facilitate our customers to enjoy the advantage of noteworthy saving, combined with great fitting service. All our customers have reaped the huge benefit of significant savings this year only. So without a second thought open an Account with us today!! It is quite probable that you are wandering what are the cutting edge differences/ advantages with Hygo? Well, to help you to make the correct decision, let’s list the reasons:

• Vast/Diverse range of Environment Friendly Quality Products • Competitive Pricing • 24/7 Online Shopping * Option • Safe & Secure Credit Card Facility • ORDER: Online, By Phone, Fax or Email • Dedicated Account Manager • Excellent Customer Care Service

Our exclusive online shopping service/ facility provide trade account holders to purchase goods with a different advantage i.e. a 30 day credit agreement.

Hygo significantly holds distribution rights for Kimberley Clark, Lotus Professional, Deb, Johnson Diversey, Evans Vanodine and many more. We simultaneously and effectively cater to major commercial, industrial and public sectors ranging from Hospitals, Nursing Homes, Doctor Clinics, Dentists, Schools, Offices, Hotels, Pubs, Restaurants, Health & Leisure Clubs, Pubs, housing complex and local authorities. Just call us today to provide the opportunity to our specialized and expert account team to assess your needs and after free consultation offer a comprehensive and personalized service package, thereby allowing you to enjoy much needed peace of mind and concentrate on your core business.

Visit: - http://www.hygo.co.uk/ Email-ID: - Sales@hygo.co.uk
